title: DSA-110 Reference Layout Schema
description: Validation schema for reference_layout metadata (stored as Parquet)

channel_width_hz.description: Channel width in Hz (negative for descending frequency order)

freq_array_hz.description: Frequency array for all channels across all subbands

integration_time_sec.description: Integration time per visibility in seconds

lst_array_rad.description: Local sidereal time array in radians

filename.description: Original filename of the reference observation

extra_keywords.description: Additional metadata keywords from the reference observation

phase_center_dec.description: Declination of phase center in radians
